GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v4.19.268
GSD.description:
net: tun: Fix use-after-free in tun_detach()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.268 by commit 1f23f1890d91812c35d32eab1b49621b6d32dc7b, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit 83c1f36f9880814b24cdf6c2f91f66f61db65326. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: tun: Fix use-after-free in tun_detach()
